description: [``botocore``] You can now either terminate/replace, ignore, or wait for EC2 Auto Scaling instances on standby or protected from scale in. Also, you can also roll back changes from a failed instance refresh.
[``botocore``] This update provides the Wisdom session ARN for contacts enabled for Wisdom in the chat channel.
[``botocore``] Adds support for waiters that automatically poll for an imported snapshot until it reaches the completed state.
[``botocore``] Amazon Polly adds two new neural Japanese voices - Kazuha, Tomoko
[``botocore``] Amazon SageMaker Autopilot adds support for selecting algorithms in CreateAutoMLJob API.
[``botocore``] This release adds support for SNS X-Ray active tracing as well as other updates.
